DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY IN BANKRUPTCY ; PERSONAL REPERCUSSIONS OF FUND CRISIS
DOC.TEXT: Four county residents in 10 say they are at least somewhat worried they or a family member will be hurt financially by the investment fund crisis.Those in households where the annual income is less than $ 50 # 000 are even more concerned . How worried are you that you or a family member will be hurt financially as a resultof the crisis involving the county ' s investment fund ? 04 # 20 , 07 # 19 , 19 Total Less than $ 50 # 000 More_than $ 50 # 000 Very worried 16 % 24 % 8 % Somewhat worried 27 % 26 % 30 % Not too worried 23 % 24 % 23 % Not at all worried 33 % 26 % 37 % Don ' t know 1 % * 2 % * Less than 1 % Source : Times Orange County Poll
